name: Sweet Escapes: Design a Bakery with Puzzle Games
name_original: Sweet Escapes: Design a Bakery with Puzzle Games
description:
Play puzzle games with sinfully sweet challenges to build and design a village of shops, each specializing in a different decadent dessert category. Match 3 puzzles let you create your cafes, from an ice cream shop to a bakery with fresh pastries, from chocolate confections to specialty coffee drinks. Design and build each shop to prepare and offer an array of delicious indulgences to your friends and customers.


Build a rundown bakery back to world-renowned glory, create an ice cream shop dedicated to every iteration of that beloved dessert and launch a high-end coffee shop that takes the world's most popular beverage to new dessert-themed heights. Every match 3 game you win helps you design home decor details for the kitchens, seating and outdoor areas of each cafe and shop.

In these cooking puzzle games, you choose the mouth-watering items you want to make, build menus, offer special events to your customers while playing matching games. As the cooking chef, you’ll tend to the surrounding land while planting and harvesting fruits and herbs for your recipes.

Play match 3 puzzles with sweet and astounding effects to create and improve your shops. Animals living in the town will help, each with a unique talent but a shared love of all things sweet and sugary. While matching games let you build your shops, watch out for the Health & Safety Inspector who’s out to bring them down!

Animals will join you on your bakery adventure, as JOY, a lovable rabbit and your dedicated assistant, and an ever-growing crew of fun and hilarious animals are there to support you.

Sweet Escapes features:

Matching Games
● Puzzle games with a dessert theme, featuring unique boosters and exploding combinations
● Match 3: swap and match pieces to build each cafe

Build Your Bakery
● Build a virtual village of cafes and shops dedicated to the most delicious desserts in the world.
● Decorate and design each shop and choose what desserts you want to prepare and offer.
● Build new dessert shops, redesign existing ones, and lovingly tend to the land while planting and harvesting fruits and herbs for your recipes.

Animal Story Games
● Bake with a crew of lovable animals – each with their own unique talent and passion for dessert – who rally together to help you build and run your shops.
● Build bakeries with your animal friends and rise to the challenge of the kooky Health & Safety Inspector with his ridiculous list of demands.

Build your bakery, bake delicious candy and sweets and join animal friends as you play matching games and puzzles! Download Sweet Escapes today!


Sweet Escapes is free to play, though some in-game items can be purchased to help boost gameplay. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.
